title: Part One: Henry Morton Stanley: The Explorer Who Shot His Way Through Africa
itunes:title: Part One: Henry Morton Stanley: The Explorer Who Shot His Way Through Africa
description:
Robert is joined by Soren Bowie to discuss Henry Morton Stanley.

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Stanley: Africa's Greatest Explorer
  2. The Imperial History Wars: Debating the British Empire
  3. Henry Morton Stanley’s Unbreakable Will
  4. Stanley: the impossible life of Africa's greatest explorer
  5. Henry Morton Stanley: Reborn in New Orleans
  6. Henry Morton Stanley and His Critics: Geography, Exploration and Empire
  7.  Example of Stanley's Congo Treaties 
  8. King Leopold's Ghost
  9. Henry Stanley, The Man Who Stole The Congo
  10. An Apology for a Pathological Brute
  11. King Leopold's Ghost: A Story of Greed, Terror, and Heroism in Colonial Africa

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
